tree.name: De'Andre Hunter
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: SAC sent Keon Ellis and Dennis Schroder to CLE; SAC sent Dario Saric and 2029 2nd to CHI; CLE sent Hunter to SAC; CHI sent Emanuel Miller to CLE; CLE sent 2027 2nd to CHI
tree.note: Forward originally drafted 4th overall by Atlanta in 2019

assetsGivenUp.name: Keon Ellis
assetsGivenUp.note: Undrafted guard signed to two-way contract, later converted

assetsGivenUp.name: Dennis Schroder
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded 2026 2nd (CHO own) to Pistons for Schroder and 2029 2nd

assetsGivenUp.name: Dario Saric
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded Jonas Valanciunas to Nuggets for Saric and trade exceptions

assetsGivenUp.name: Jonas Valanciunas
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded Sidy Cissoko, 2028 2nd (DEN own), and 2029 2nd (SAC own) to Wizards for Valanciunas

assetsGivenUp.name: Sidy Cissoko
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Received from Spurs in the De'Aaron Fox 3-team trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Wing drafted #44 overall by SAS in 2023. Shared cost with Zach LaVine trade

assetsGivenUp.name: De'Aaron Fox
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard drafted 5th overall from Kentucky. Shared cost — also produced Zach LaVine

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 2nd Round Pick (DEN)
assetsGivenUp.note: Received from Spurs in Fox trade, DEN own

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Acquired from DET in Schroder trade, sent to CHI in Hunter deal
